message.content:
Monday:
Breakfast: Gluten-free toast with avocado and sliced tomato, served with a side of fresh fruit salad.
Lunch: Quinoa salad with mixed veggies (cucumber, bell peppers, carrots), chickpeas, and a lemon vinaigrette dressing.
Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted asparagus and sweet potato wedges.
Snacks: Fresh berries or rice cakes with all-fruit jam.

Tuesday:
Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with coconut milk, mixed frozen berries, and topped with granola and chia seeds.
Lunch: Vegan lentil soup with a side of gluten-free crackers.
Dinner: Stuffed bell peppers with rice, cooked ground turkey, and sautéed onions and zucchini.
Snacks: Carrot sticks with hummus or rice cakes with all-fruit jam.

Wednesday:
Breakfast: Gluten-free oatmeal cooked in coconut milk, topped with fresh fruit and a drizzle of agave nectar.
Lunch: Mixed greens salad with cherry tomatoes, cucumber, bell peppers, and roasted pumpkin seeds, served with a lemon-juice vinaigrette dressing.
Dinner: Grilled chicken breast with sautéed mushrooms and spinach, accompanied by brown rice or quinoa.
Snacks: Fresh fruit or rice cakes with all-fruit jam.

Thursday:
Breakfast: Gluten-free toast with mashed avocado and a scrambled egg, served with a side of fresh fruit salad.
Lunch: Veggie wrap with roasted red pepper, hummus, and greens in a gluten-free wrap.
Dinner: Zucchini noodles with marinara sauce and meatballs made from ground turkey or beef.
Snacks: Fresh berries or rice cakes with all-fruit jam.

Friday:
Breakfast: Greek yogurt (soy or coconut-based) with mixed frozen berries and gluten-free granola.
Lunch: Chickpea and veggie stir-fry with a side of brown rice or quinoa.
Dinner: Turkey chili with gluten-free crackers or corn muffins.
Snacks: Fresh fruit or rice cakes with all-fruit jam.

Saturday:
Breakfast: Gluten-free pancakes made with coconut milk, topped with fresh fruit and a drizzle of agave nectar.
Lunch: Vegan roasted vegetable wraps with hummus in a gluten-free wrap.
Dinner: Baked chicken breast with steamed broccoli and caulifrice rice or mashed sweet potato.
Snacks: Carrot sticks with hummus or rice cakes with all-fruit jam.

Sunday:
Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with coconut milk, mixed frozen berries, and topped with granola and chia seeds.
Lunch: Quinoa salad with mixed veggies (cucumber, bell peppers, carrots), chickpeas, and a lemon vinaigrette dressing.
Dinner: Grilled fish or shrimp with sautéed greens and brown rice or quinoa.
Snacks: Fresh berries or rice cakes with all-fruit jam.
